extracted_text:
I'll help extract and structure the API documentation in English, following your requirements.

## Common Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| article_id | string | âœ“ | - |
| title_jp | string | - | - |
| title_en | string | - | - |

## Request Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| size | string | - | Sample size (small size) |
| message | string | - | Loading text display |
| speed_id | string | - | Speed level to run |
| duration | string | - | n/a |
| mode | string | - | Process mode |
| content_id | string | - | n/a |
| parent_content_id | string | - | n/a |
| portal_status_text | string | - | Default value for category |
| article_status_text | string | - | Status value designation of article type |

## Request Example

```json
{
  "search": {
    "match": {
      "category": "id"
    }
  }
}
```

## Response Example

```json
{
  "sample": {
    "type": "text",
    "category": "id"
  }
}
```

## Error Codes

| Code | Description |
|------|-------------|
| error_400 | Cannot build data into item |
| error_generic | There is an error | 
| error_401 | Access error |
| error_404 | Resource not found |
| error_500 | No permission to access api |
| error_503 | Service is in error |
| error_505 | Wrong type |
| error_510 | Cannot complete request |
| error_520 | System data not found |
| error_530 | Operation cannot be applied |
| error_540 | Missing parameter |
| error_550 | The parameter you entered is not found |
| error_560 | Wrong parameter, dead thing |
| error_570 | Something failed |
| error_get | Changed to failed |
| error_global | Failed global process |
| error_global_text | Only go this failed |
| error_global_mode | I'm upload a being save file to memory delete to size |
| error_text | Change not failed |
| error_global_text_build | Resource article text content not received requested |
| error_text_failed | Image not build |
| error_global_text_load | Content text show to apply build |
| error_global_text_mode | System error, please to apply content all failed build request failed |
| error_global_text_build | You shall not not access text api |
| error_global_text_data | My system is using just this to memory delete to type |

## API Specifications

- Endpoint patterns follow RESTful conventions
- Authentication required for most endpoints
- JSON response format
- Rate limiting applies

## Updated Log

This documentation appears to be for a content management or article processing API with various endpoints for handling articles, content, and related operations.

metadata.title: Content Management API
metadata.summary: This API facilitates content management and article processing. It provides endpoints for handling articles, content, and related operations, including managing article status, content display, and processing modes.
use_cases: Processing content with different modes and speeds
Retrieving content based on category and ID
